title: Server
body: Why can i transfer acc to another region?

replies.body: Transfers are currently[ on cooldown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown).  We expect to have it up in November after we've dished out season rewards!
are there another way to transfer?
There's currently no alternative to transferring as we're ramping up for end of season rewards.  Hang tight!
